Title: Establishes the electric customer bill of rights during a service disruption
Summary: Provides that the public service commission shall commence a rulemaking proceeding to set minimum requirements regarding the rights of customers that electric corporations shall adhere to at times preceding and for the duration of an electric service disruption; defines terms; requires electric corporations to establish a unique telephone number for customers with life-saving equipment and special needs; requires dry ice distribution and power charging stations; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง65-c, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to establishing the electric customer bill of rights during a service disruption
